name: INTERMODAL ASSOCIATION OF NORTH AMERICA
description: Trade association for intermodal transportation industry.
sampleDescriptions: Combatting/reducing costly and dangerous cargo theft on the U.S. supply chain. To that end, supporting HR 2853/S 1404 Combating Organized Retail Crime Act to strengthen national detection and response
